snippet: The crew of the U.S.S. Chung-Hoon gave Billy Hurley, a Naval Academy graduate who served on the ship from 2007 to 2009, an enthusiastic reception in Honolulu ahead of his PGA Tour debut.
abstract: Profile of Billy Hurley III, who will become the first Naval Academy graduate to earn a PGA Tour card; Hurley put his golf career on hold to fulfill his military service.
lead_paragraph: The crew of the U.S.S. Chung-Hoon gave Billy Hurley, a Naval Academy graduate who served on the ship from 2007 to 2009, an enthusiastic reception in Honolulu ahead of his PGA Tour debut.

headline.seo: Naval Officer Embarks on PGA Tour Career
